The Calculate Field tool calculates values for a new or existing field.

The input layer or table for which a field will be calculated.

Layer is specified by default when Input dataset is not populated. To add an input table, select Table before adding a dataset.

The attribute query that determines which subset of records will have the field calculation applied. To apply the calculation to all records, leave this parameter blank.

The field where the calculated values will be added. You can choose an existing field or create a field.

The SQL expression used to calculate values for Field to calculate.

The expression can include basic operators, functions, and field names and must create values that match the field type for Field to calculate.
